definition: Gradually getting <emph>faster</emph>. Sometimes shortened to accel.
A note that lasts for one beat.
A note that lasts for two beats.
A note that lasts for half a beat, meaning it is half as long as a crotchet.
A note that lasts for four beats.
A note that lasts for a quarter of a beat. Four semi-quavers last the same amount of time as one crotchet.
The vertical line that sticks up or down from some notes.
